title: Optimizing leaf nutrient status, growth, and yield parameters in high-density apple orchards (cv. Super chief) via integrated drip irrigation and fertigation techniques
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Kapil Sharma, J.C. Sharma, Sunny Sharma, Nitin Sharma, Rohit Sharma, Ananthakrishnan S, Abeer Hashem, Khalid F. Almutairi, Elsayed Fathi Abd_Allah
